title: Adela Mag - SW Engineer
about.name: Name:
about.first: Software engineer with experience in Model-Based Testing in the automotive industry, focused on validation, verification, and software quality for complex systems.
about.second: Passionate about creating clean and responsive user interfaces using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Comfortable with modern build tools like Webpack and familiar with backend fundamentals, including Node.js and client–server communication.
about.third: Open to opportunities in both software and hardware, creating efficient and reliable solutions.
experience.description_1: I worked as a Software System Engineer within the Model-Based Design (MBD) Academy, an activity focused on the development of software testing methods and tools for the automotive industry. The main responsibilities included the automation of software testing in Matlab/Simulink, the improvement of test case modeling methods in compliance with the ASIL D safety level, the optimization of testing processes, test execution and reporting, as well as defect management and tracking.
experience.description_2: My activities within the MBD Academy included learning the V-Model process, gaining knowledge of AUTOSAR software architecture, introduction to the Automotive SPICE industry standard, and training in Matlab/Simulink model design.
